<small>Also see: [[H7809]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁ֫חַר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.19.15|Gen 19:15]]</sup> ==dawn==; — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Sam.9.26|1Sam 9:26]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֑חַר‎</span> [[Judg.19.25|Judg 19:25]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחְרָךְ‎</span> [[Isa.47.11|Isa 47:11]] (but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחֲדָהּ‎</span>); — ***dawn***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָה‎</span> ***rise*** [[Gen.19.15|Gen 19:15]]; [[Gen.32.25|Gen 32:25]]; [[Gen.32.27|Gen 32:27]]; [[Josh.6.15|Josh 6:15]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.19.25|Judg 19:25]]; [[1Sam.9.26|1Sam 9:26]]; [[Neh.4.15|Neh 4:15]]; [[Jonah.4.7|Jonah 4:7]] opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵיפָה‎</span> [[Amos.4.13|Amos 4:13]] as adverb ***at dawn*** [[Ps.57.9|Ps 57:9]] = [[Ps.108.3|Ps 108:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַפְעַפֵּישֿׁ‎</span> [[Job.3.9|Job 3:9]]; [[Job.41.10|Job 41:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּנְפֵישֿׁ‎</span> [[Ps.139.9|Ps 139:9]]; [[Ps.110.3|Ps 110:3]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶחֶם שׁ‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁחָר‎</span> below); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> also [[Job.38.12|Job 38:12]], in simile [[Hos.6.3|Hos 6:3]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשַׁחֲרֵנוּ כֵּן נִמְצָאֵהוּ‎</span> as infinitive, see following, [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]<sup>Beitr. 208</sup> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]), [[Isa.58.8|Isa 58:8]]; [[Song.6.10|Song 6:10]]; [[Joel.2.2|Joel 2:2]] (al. ***blackness***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָן וַעֲרָפֶל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּןשֿׁ‎</span> [[Isa.14.12|Isa 14:12]] (of star, figurative of royal splendour; — literal as myth [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 300</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵין לוֺ שׁ‎</span> [[Isa.8.20|Isa 8:20]] is obscure, so also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּשּׁ‎</span> [[Hos.10.15|Hos 10:15]] ([[BDB#We|We]] ***in storm***, i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּשַּׂעַר‎</span>). — [[Isa.47.11|Isa 47:11]] usually, but improbably, ***dawn*** (origin) of calamity: [[BDB#JHMich|JHMich]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Rö|Rö]] ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]]) [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others ***charm away*** ([[BDB#RV|RVm]]) (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***enchant*** ([[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Heid. 2. 159, 200</sup>), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***enchantment*** [= Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סחר‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Hofmus. 24. 1</sup>]); but see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחַד‎</span>].
